ygData.subject: Re: New to Online gaming
ygData.msgSnippet: haven t read or posted in a long time. Getting tired fingers typing on all the boards I m on. LOL. I ve discovered a saturation point. However on EQ. I ve been
ygData.messageBody:
haven't read or posted in a long time. Getting tired fingers typing
on all the boards I'm on. LOL. I've discovered a saturation point.

However on EQ. I've been playing since just a few months after
release. I've still only got a 44 druid as my highest. But that's not
really too much of a concern for me as one might thing.

But you have to get used to watching your friends pass you by and
wonder why you're such a slow poke if you don't play too much.
heheheh. =) If you can get over that, you can still have a blast!

shooman out
